hero.text: Innovative and safe solutions for the fire brigade.

modernToolsSection.heading: Modern firefighting equipment
modernToolsSection.text: At Dexwal, we specialize in producing specialized equipment for fire brigades. We offer innovative equipment for fire trucks that meets contemporary rescue challenges. Our flagship products include a battery-powered hose reel, increasing the effectiveness of rescue operations. Specialized extinguishing/cooling platforms are crucial for electric vehicle fires, enabling quick and effective interventions. Additionally, our fire extinguishers are reliable auxiliary tools that will quickly stop the spread of fire. By choosing equipment from Dexwal, you increase the safety and efficiency of your fire unit.

homepage.heroContent: At Dexwal, we create not only equipment but also safe and effective solutions that support both Volunteer and State Fire Brigades in their daily operations.

firstSection.sectionTextHighlight: We are a company operating on the market for over 30 years.
firstSection.sectionText: We have existed since 1990. We are intensively developing, spreading our products on a European scale.

secondSection.sectionFirstText: Initially focused on the production of agricultural machinery and rubber and plastic components, over time we expanded our operations to include the automotive sector, introducing products such as agricultural machinery and tools. In 2010, we merged with the Czech company NL MOTO s. r. o. and started cooperation with NSK Bearings.
secondSection.sectionSecondText: Another important step in our business is the start of production of fire hoses. This includes innovative hose reels, extinguishing and cooling platforms for electric vehicles, and positive pressure ventilation fans, which are essential for effective rescue and firefighting operations. Our products are characterized by innovation, as well as the highest quality of workmanship and reliability. Thanks to this, our products gain the trust of firefighters and manufacturers of fire trucks.
